---
title: "InteractionExtension"
---

```{r}

# reproducible R environments
library(groundhog)

# dependencies
pkgs <- c(
  "dplyr",
  "ggplot2",
  "ggcorrplot",
  "mvtnorm"
)

# activate libraries
suppressMessages(groundhog.library(pkgs, "2023-03-01"))
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

x <- runif(100)

x %>% head
```

```{r}

# compute distance matrix, d_{ij} = |x_i - x_j|
d <- abs(outer(x,x,"-")) 

d %>% dim

d[, 1:5] %>% head

d %>% ggcorrplot()
```

```{r}

# length scale
l <- 1
```

```{r}

# squared exponential kernel
Sigma_SE <- exp(-d^2/(2*l^2)) 

Sigma_SE %>% dim

Sigma_SE[, 1:5] %>% head
```

```{r}

Sigma_SE %>% 
  ggcorrplot()
```
```{r}

y <- mvtnorm::rmvnorm(1, sigma = Sigma_SE)

y %>% dim
```

```{r}

plot(x,y)
```
